data.text:
Courage is the first of human qualities because it is the quality which guarantees the others. - Aristotle

Going over the falls is a solemn and frantic experience.
The atom's decay is a binomial distribution. A computer's clock ticks inside the chassis of an afterburning jet engine.
A road cut from silicon stretches to the horizon.

data.title: MMXXIV
data.description: Our recent progress in information and artificial intelligence technology against a historical backdrop.

data.text: We have built it as we were able. Now where will it take us?
